text: Khawa tisuoli kei'n akaring khouring mili khat-um upa ngai'n inkahiil reng in-ongna mun laicheiya Keelngamteii ngirra kaom inkhat kaleimu. Keelngamteii kha inleithat angnga kaleimu. Keelngamteii kha araki sari khat-um amit sari indou, khawa ngaikha manmasituol pumpuiya injuotir Pathian ratha sari ngaikha in-eii. Isa 53:7; Zech 4:10
